name: tm53
effect: Teaches Energy Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Energy Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
